name: Sunny Land - Prototype
description:
Welcome to the Sunny Land Prototype - made in Godot!

This is currently a simple prototype I made to test features and functionality, and get people's opinions on. I plan to add more features, such as taking damage, but I'll be doing that in a later update.

NOTE:  Please do not press "EXIT", as then you will no longer be able to play the game. To fix this, please refresh the page.

CHANGELOG:

v001 - Initial release.
